title: Four teenagers shot during birthday party Saturday night in Marrero, JPSO says
content:
MARRERO, La. —
Four teenagers were shot during a birthday party Saturday night in Marrero, the Jefferson Parish Sheriff's Office said.
The shooting was reported around 11:30 p.m. at the Chit Chat Rental Hall at Lapalco Boulevard and Manor Heights Drive.
Investigators said approximately 25 teenagers were attending a birthday party for a 17-year-old when gunfire broke out at the building.
Paramedics arrived and found a 16-year-old boy with a gunshot wound to his right knee, a 16-year-old girl with a gunshot wound to her right cheek, a 15-year-old boy with a gunshot wound to his left lower leg and a 15-year-old boy with a gunshot wound to the back of his neck.
The Sheriff's Office said the four teenagers were taken to a hospital for treatment. None of their injuries are life-threatening.
During the course of the investigation, the Sheriff's Office found 18 spent shell casings on the opposite side of Lapalco Boulevard near Bonnie Ann Drive. Detectives believe there was more than one gunman in the incident.
The Sheriff's Office believes the gunmen got out of a vehicle, stood in front of the street and opened fire multiple times into the building. None of the victims have been identified.
Officials said a motive for the shooting has not been determined. Descriptions of the gunmen in the incident have not been released.
Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call Crimestoppers at 504-822-1111. Additional updates are expected from the Sheriff's Office.
